description: Comprehensive trading performance dashboard showing your account status, portfolio performance, trading activity, and current positions over the past 30 days. This analysis includes key metrics like returns, risk measures, trading statistics, and actionable insights to help optimize your investment strategy.

body.description: Total current market value of all positions plus cash, representing the account's total equity
Available funds for purchasing securities, calculated based on account type, existing positions, and margin requirements
Uninvested cash available in the account for immediate trading or withdrawal
Maximum buying power available for day trading, typically 4x the account equity for pattern day traders
Total portfolio return over the past 30 days, including realized and unrealized gains/losses
Highest single-day portfolio performance in the 30-day period
Lowest single-day portfolio performance in the 30-day period
Annualized standard deviation of daily returns, measuring portfolio risk and price fluctuation intensity
Risk-adjusted return metric. Values above 1.0 are generally considered good, above 2.0 excellent. Calculated as (portfolio return - risk-free rate) / portfolio volatility
Total number of buy and sell transactions executed in the past 30 days
Number and percentage of profitable trades that resulted in a net gain
Number and percentage of unprofitable trades that resulted in a net loss
Average profit per winning trade, indicating typical gain size on successful positions
Average loss per losing trade, indicating typical loss size on unsuccessful positions
Most profitable single trade in the 30-day period
Least profitable single trade in the 30-day period
Number of distinct securities currently held in the portfolio
Largest position by market value and its contribution to total portfolio
Portfolio allocation to technology sector stocks
Portfolio allocation to healthcare sector stocks
Portfolio allocation to financial sector stocks
Portfolio allocation to consumer sector stocks
Overall performance grade based on risk-adjusted returns, diversification, and trading efficiency
Key portfolio strength identified through performance analysis

body.value: Good win rate of 65.2% on trades
body.description: Key trading efficiency strength showing consistent profitability
Key risk management strength showing proper diversification

body.value: Consider reducing position concentration in technology sector
body.description: Primary recommendation for improved risk management

body.value: Average loss per trade could be reduced with better stop-loss discipline
body.description: Trading strategy improvement for better risk control

body.value: Cash allocation might be too conservative for current market conditions
body.description: Capital allocation suggestion for potentially higher returns
